content.raw:
Running and spawning different worlds works fine on my machine but when I exit from the application it spouts the following error:
Error in `gzclient': double free or corruption (!prev)
...followed by a backtrace and memory map. Here's the complete error output

http://pastebin.com/5Q44QCj9

My machine - running Kinetic on Xenial, using Nvidia Titan X graphics driver
I followed the "install from source" from gazebosim.org for installing Gazebo 8
content.html:
Running and spawning different worlds works fine on my machine but when I exit from the application it spouts the following error: Error in `gzclient': double free or corruption (!prev) ...followed by a backtrace and memory map. Here's the complete error output

http://pastebin.com/5Q44QCj9

My machine - running Kinetic on Xenial, using Nvidia Titan X graphics driver I followed the "install from source" from gazebosim.org for installing Gazebo 8
